name: Webnovel Reading mode
description:
A simple single-color reading mode for a lot of sites I use.

No plan to expand it more then for what I use personally.

Change the colors to your liking.

    #outer-wrapper,
    #main-wrapper,
    #main-post-sec
    {
    max-width: 100%;
    width: 100%;
    min-width: 100%;
    padding: 0;
    margin: 0 auto 0 auto;
    float: unset;
    box-shadow: unset;
    -webkit-box-shadow: unset;
    overflow: visible;
    }
    
    
    html
    {
      padding-left: /*[[padding]]*/ !important;
      padding-right: /*[[padding]]*/ !important;
      width: unset !important;
    }
  
  /* Font */
  
    html,
    .hentry,
    p,
    .post-body,
    .post_body,
    span,
    pre,
    samp,
    .entry-the-content
  {
    font-size: /*[[fontsize]]*/ !important;
    line-height: /*[[lineheight]]*/ !important;
    font-family: 'Open Sans',sans-serif !important;
    text-shadow: none !important;
  }
    
    p,
    span,
    strong
    {
      margin-bottom: 1.5em !important;
      background-color: transparent !important;
    }
    
    
    
  
  /* Colours */
  
  * {
    color: /*[[fontcolor]]*/ !important;
    background: /*[[bgcolor]]*/ !important;
    background-color: /*[[bgcolor]]*/ !important;
    background-image: none !important;
    border-color: #000 !important;
  }  
    
    
  /* Font Colours */
  
  a,
  a * {
      color: /*[[linkcolor]]*/ !important;
      text-decoration: none !important;
      font-size: /*[[linksize]]*/ !important;
      line-height: /*[[linksize]]*/ !important;
      background-color: transparent !important;
  }
  a:hover,
  a:hover *,
  a:visited:hover,
  a:visited:hover *,
  .link:hover,
  .link:hover * {
      color: #444 !important;
      text-shadow: 0 0 10px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9) !important
  }
  a:visited,
  a:visited * {
      color: #202020 !important
  }
    
    /* PREV NEXT Buttons */
    
    .site-content .navigation-paging, .site-content .navigation-post,
    .wp-post-navigation div,
    .site-main .paging-navigation, .site-main .post-navigation,
    .comment-navigation .nav-previous, .paging-navigation .nav-previous, .post-navigation .nav-previous
    {
      width: unset !important;
      margin: unset !important;
    }
    
    /* Cursor */
    *
    {
      cursor: url("data:image/png;base64,"), auto !important; 
    }
    
  /* MOBILE  */
    
    body.custom-background,
    html.nightmode body
    {
      background: #000 !important;
    }
    
    /*
    #content > div:nth-of-type(1)
    {
      display: none !important;
    }
    */
    .box
    {
      background: #000;
    }
    
    @-moz-document url-prefix(https://www.lightnovelbastion.com/)
    {
      *
      {
        background-color: #000 !important;
      }

      footer, .wrapper.style4
      {
        display: none !important;
      }
    }
    
    /* Gravitytales mobile buttons */
    
    .btn-primary 
    { 
      background-color: #1a1a1a !important;      
      border-color: #1a1a1a !important;      
    }
    
    .btn-group-justified > .btn, .btn-group-justified > .btn-group
    {
      float: none !important;
      display: unset !important;
      width: unset !important;
      margin: unset !important;
      border: none !important;
      padding: unset !important;
    }
    
    /*moonbunnycafe mobile*/
    
    @media (max-width: 650px) {
	body, #content p, #content ul, #content ol,#content code, #content pre, #content blockquote {
		font-size: /*[[fontsize]]*/ !important;
      }
      }
    /*kobatochan buttons*/
      
      @-moz-document domain(kobatochan.com) {
        #nav-single {
          float: unset;
          position: unset;
          text-align: center;
          }
        }
    
}
